A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Production value-wise\, looks great. But direction\, story & characters arcs were developed poorly. It was a beautiful looking film\, but one that is very pointless\, dumb\, and does not move the star wars universe in a good direction. I feel this is a more of a step back than anything else. I do not recommend to anyone to watch it in theaters and wait till it comes out on netflix or a cheap format.
